snippet.title: Tranquil Isle Reveal Trailer
snippet.description: Tranquil Isle is a lo-fi city-building rogue-lite and the debut game from solo dev Thomas Daly and indie publishers Future Friends Games. Grow your settlements on idyllic, randomly generated islands, managing resources and upgrading skills – or chill out and build with no restrictions in sandbox mode. https://store.steampowered.com/app/2324180/Tranquil_Isle/ #indiegames #cozygames #gaming
